username.description: The username of the vSphere vCenter.

enable_ha.description: If set to True will enable HA when the cluster is created.

enable_vsan.description: If set to True will enable vSAN when the cluster is created.

datacenter_name.description: The name of the datacenter the cluster will be created in.

hostname.description: The hostname or IP address of the vSphere vCenter.

cluster_name.description: The name of the cluster that will be created

enable_drs.description: If set to True will enable DRS when the cluster is created.

password.description: The password of the vSphere vCenter.

validate_certs.description: Allows connection when SSL certificates are not valid. Set to false when certificates are not trusted.
